title: IMV up 53% premarket on coronavirus vaccine plan
description: • Thinly traded micro cap IMV (NASDAQ:IMV) is up 53% premarket on light volume in response to its
content: Thinly traded micro cap IMV NASDAQ IMV is up premarket on light volume in response to its announced plan to develop a COVID vaccine based on its lipid based delivery platform called DPX It will collaborate with Joanne Langley M D and Scott Halper chars
